kpi_info.title: TFO peak for AMR/AMR-WB codecs
kpi_info.use: The highest number of simultaneous TFO services for all connections in which MGW has participated in the TFO codec negotiations and TFO_AMR/AMR-WB codec is used. This counter shows the highest value of the TFO_AMR_CURRENT counter during one result accumulation period for all connections in one physical MGW.
